trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to a given variable that is defined in the style sheet during runtime execution.
trans-unit.target: 將介面提供給指定的變數，該變數於 Run Time 時在樣式表中定義。

trans-unit.source: For more information on using <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable> , see article Q324899, "HOW TO: Implement and Use Custom Functions When You Execute XPath Queries in Visual Basic .NET" in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關使用<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable>，請參閱文件 Q324899，< 如何： 實作和使用自訂函式時您執行 XPath 查詢中 Visual Basic.NET 中 「 Microsoft 知識庫中在http://support.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext" /> representing the execution context of the variable.
Evaluates the variable at runtime and returns an object that represents the value of the variable.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段評估變數並傳回表示變數值的物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the value of the variable.
Possible return types include number, string, Boolean, document fragment, or node set.
trans-unit.target: 可能的傳回型別包括數字、字串、布林值、文件片段或節點集。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the variable is local.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示這個變數是否為區域變數。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the variable is a local variable in the current context; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果變數是目前內容中的區域變數，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the variable is an Extensible Stylesheet Language Transformations (XSLT) parameter.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示變數是否為可延伸樣式表語言轉換 (XSLT) 參數。

trans-unit.source: This can be a parameter to a style sheet or a template.
trans-unit.target: 它可以是樣式表或樣板的參數。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the variable is an XSLT parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果變數是 XSLT 參數，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType" /> representing the XML Path Language (XPath) type of the variable.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType" />，表示變數的 XML 路徑語言 (XPath) 型別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType" /> representing the XPath type of the variable.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType" />，表示變數的 XPath 型別。
